content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254032,"originalJapaneseLine":"少しは警戒していたが、今は美樹の覚醒が気になってそろどころではない","translatedEnglishLine":"I was a little cautious, but now I'm too concerned about Miki's awakening to pay attention to anything else."},{"lineNumber":254033,"originalJapaneseLine":"路上の石ころのように眼中にない","translatedEnglishLine":"She is like a pebble on the road—completely out of sight."},{"lineNumber":254034,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":254035,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　基本勝てずにゲームオーバーです","translatedEnglishLine":"Basically, if you lose, it's game over."},{"lineNumber":254036,"originalJapaneseLine":"奇跡的にケイブリスに勝てた場合","translatedEnglishLine":"If you miraculously manage to defeat Cavebris,"},{"lineNumber":254037,"originalJapaneseLine":"やった・・やったぞ、カオスも大喜び","translatedEnglishLine":"I did it... I did it! Chaos is overjoyed too."},{"lineNumber":254038,"originalJapaneseLine":"まさかケイブリスを倒すなんて、すげー","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't believe I defeated Cavebris, awesome!"},{"lineNumber":254039,"originalJapaneseLine":"喜んでいた所に報告が来る","translatedEnglishLine":"Just as I was celebrating, a report arrived."},{"lineNumber":254040,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹ちゃんが・・美樹ちゃんが・・魔王になってしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki-chan... Miki-chan has become the Demon King."},{"lineNumber":254041,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、魔王美樹によりランスは殺され・・世界は暗黒に落ちる","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, Lance was killed by Demon King Miki... and the world fell into darkness."},{"lineNumber":254042,"originalJapaneseLine":"ｇａｍｅｏｖｅｒ","translatedEnglishLine":"Game Over"},{"lineNumber":254043,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮに進軍して来ている魔軍と何度か戦った後","translatedEnglishLine":"After several battles with the demon army advancing on JAPAN,"},{"lineNumber":254044,"originalJapaneseLine":"ストロガノフに接触する","translatedEnglishLine":"They came into contact with Stroganov."},{"lineNumber":254045,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、戦うのはストロガノフではなく、彼は力が出せない状態というのを見せて","translatedEnglishLine":"However, it wasn't Stroganov who fought; he showed that he was unable to use his power."},{"lineNumber":254046,"originalJapaneseLine":"マエリータ隊が戦う","translatedEnglishLine":"The Maelita squad fought instead."},{"lineNumber":254047,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":254048,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮに進軍して来ている魔軍と何度か戦った後","translatedEnglishLine":"After several battles with the demon army advancing on JAPAN,"},{"lineNumber":254049,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピサロに接触する","translatedEnglishLine":"They came into contact with Pizarro."},{"lineNumber":254050,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピサロはケイブリスに怒られびびっている、魔剣カオスを持つ者を殺して","translatedEnglishLine":"Pizarro, scared after angering Cavebris, attacks to kill anyone wielding the demon sword Chaos,"},{"lineNumber":254051,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを献上すればケイブリスの心象もよくなるぞ、と攻撃してくる","translatedEnglishLine":"thinking that offering it will improve Cavebris's favor."},{"lineNumber":254052,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":254053,"originalJapaneseLine":"ストロガノフ、マエリータ隊、ピサロ、または魔物大将軍などを倒した後","translatedEnglishLine":"After defeating Stroganov, Maelita squad, Pizarro, or the great demon generals,"},{"lineNumber":254054,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうだ、さすが俺様・・","translatedEnglishLine":"How's that? As expected of me..."},{"lineNumber":254055,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、ＪＡＰＡＮに押し寄せてくる魔軍の数はあまりにも多い","translatedEnglishLine":"But the number of demon troops flooding into JAPAN is overwhelming."},{"lineNumber":254056,"originalJapaneseLine":"人類軍は総崩れ・・ランスがいくらがんばってもなんとか出来る状況では無かった","translatedEnglishLine":"The human army was completely broken—the situation was beyond what Lance could handle no matter how hard he tried."},{"lineNumber":254057,"originalJapaneseLine":"くっ・・次・・とさらに戦うとするランスだが","translatedEnglishLine":"Kuh... Lance tries to fight again, saying 'Next...',"},{"lineNumber":254058,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルが止める、ランス様、傷、疲労・・もうあぶないです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Shiru stops him: \"Lance-sama, with your wounds and fatigue... it's dangerous.\""},{"lineNumber":254059,"originalJapaneseLine":"いったん戻りましょう、このままではと必至で止める","translatedEnglishLine":"Desperately, she insists they retreat for now."},{"lineNumber":254060,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたないとそれを受け入れるランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance accepts it, saying it can't be giant battleship."},{"lineNumber":254064,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t巨大戦艦遺跡に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"        They have arrived at the giant battleship sleep."},{"lineNumber":254066,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこれからどうする","translatedEnglishLine":"        What shall we do from well."},{"lineNumber":254069,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tその頃、勇者テオマン","translatedEnglishLine":"        Meanwhile, the hero Teoman"},{"lineNumber":254070,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t人類の死者が５０％を越え準備が整った","translatedEnglishLine":"        More than 50% of humanity have died, preparations are complete."},{"lineNumber":254071,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランス砦に侵入","translatedEnglishLine":"        He infiltrates Lance's fortress."},{"lineNumber":254072,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t健太郎と美樹を殺す","translatedEnglishLine":"        He kills Kentaro and Miki."},{"lineNumber":254073,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tそこにランスが戻って来た","translatedEnglishLine":"        Then Lance returns."},{"lineNumber":254074,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t使徒コーラが勇者の真実を告げる","translatedEnglishLine":"        The apostle Kola reveals the truth about the hero."},{"lineNumber":254075,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t勇者のお仕事ごくろうさん、魔王はもうすぐ蘇る","translatedEnglishLine":"        \"Good job on your hero duties; the Demon King will soon be revived.\""},{"lineNumber":254076,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t言いたい放題いって立ち去る","translatedEnglishLine":"        She says whatever she wants and then leaves."},{"lineNumber":254077,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tテオマンは呆然、そこをランスに殺される","translatedEnglishLine":"        Teoman is stunned, then is killed by Horaga."},{"lineNumber":254083,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t世界は魔人ケイブリスの手に落ちる","translatedEnglishLine":"        The world falls into the hands of the demon Byuton."},{"lineNumber":254085,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t４ヶ月後","translatedEnglishLine":"        Four months later."},{"lineNumber":254086,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランス達は神々の国に降り立った","translatedEnglishLine":"        Lance and his group have descended to the land of the gods."},{"lineNumber":254087,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tウィリスが現れて止めるが無理","translatedEnglishLine":"        Willis appears and tries to stop them but fails."},{"lineNumber":254088,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t女神アリスと戦う","translatedEnglishLine":"        They fight the goddess Alice."},{"lineNumber":254089,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t女神アリスに全滅させられた","translatedEnglishLine":"        They were annihilated by the goddess Alice."},{"lineNumber":254090,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t世界を変えるのはまだ早かった","translatedEnglishLine":"        It was still too early to change the world."},{"lineNumber":254091,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス達がリーザスに向けて出発","translatedEnglishLine":"        Lance and his group set out toward Leazas."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しは警戒していたが、今は美樹の覚醒が気になってそろどころではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was a little cautious, but now I'm too concerned about Miki's awakening to pay attention to anything else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 路上の石ころのように眼中にない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is like a pebble on the road—completely out of sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 基本勝てずにゲームオーバーです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically, if you lose, it's game over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡的にケイブリスに勝てた場合
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you miraculously manage to defeat Cavebris,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やった・・やったぞ、カオスも大喜び
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I did it... I did it! Chaos is overjoyed too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさかケイブリスを倒すなんて、すげー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't believe I defeated Cavebris, awesome!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 喜んでいた所に報告が来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as I was celebrating, a report arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹ちゃんが・・美樹ちゃんが・・魔王になってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki-chan... Miki-chan has become the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、魔王美樹によりランスは殺され・・世界は暗黒に落ちる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, Lance was killed by Demon King Miki... and the world fell into darkness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｇａｍｅｏｖｅｒ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Game Over

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに進軍して来ている魔軍と何度か戦った後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After several battles with the demon army advancing on JAPAN,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフに接触する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They came into contact with Stroganov.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、戦うのはストロガノフではなく、彼は力が出せない状態というのを見せて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, it wasn't Stroganov who fought; he showed that he was unable to use his power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Maelita squad fought instead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに進軍して来ている魔軍と何度か戦った後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After several battles with the demon army advancing on JAPAN,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロに接触する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They came into contact with Pizarro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロはケイブリスに怒られびびっている、魔剣カオスを持つ者を殺して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pizarro, scared after angering Cavebris, attacks to kill anyone wielding the demon sword Chaos,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを献上すればケイブリスの心象もよくなるぞ、と攻撃してくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thinking that offering it will improve Cavebris's favor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフ、マエリータ隊、ピサロ、または魔物大将軍などを倒した後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After defeating Stroganov, Maelita squad, Pizarro, or the great demon generals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうだ、さすが俺様・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How's that? As expected of me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ＪＡＰＡＮに押し寄せてくる魔軍の数はあまりにも多い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the number of demon troops flooding into JAPAN is overwhelming.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類軍は総崩れ・・ランスがいくらがんばってもなんとか出来る状況では無かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The human army was completely broken—the situation was beyond what Lance could handle no matter how hard he tried.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ・・次・・とさらに戦うとするランスだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kuh... Lance tries to fight again, saying 'Next...',

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが止める、ランス様、傷、疲労・・もうあぶないです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiru stops him: "Lance-sama, with your wounds and fatigue... it's dangerous."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったん戻りましょう、このままではと必至で止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Desperately, she insists they retreat for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないとそれを受け入れるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance accepts it, saying it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 織田の城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oda's Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況は押されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle situation is unfavorable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: タイムカプセル、巨大戦艦を思いつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They come up with the idea of a time capsule and a giant battleship.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大戦艦遺跡に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have arrived at the giant battleship ruins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹と健太郎をスリープさせる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki and Kentaro are put into sleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからどうする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What shall we do from here?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王、勇者はいつ動き出すか分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King and the Hero could move at any time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後の事もなんとかする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will manage things for later as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、勇者テオマン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the hero Teoman

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の死者が５０％を越え準備が整った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More than 50% of humanity have died, preparations are complete.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦に侵入
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He infiltrates Lance's fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎と美樹を殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He kills Kentaro and Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランスが戻って来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Lance returns.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒コーラが勇者の真実を告げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The apostle Kola reveals the truth about the hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者のお仕事ごくろうさん、魔王はもうすぐ蘇る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good job on your hero duties; the Demon King will soon be revived."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言いたい放題いって立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She says whatever she wants and then leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テオマンは呆然、そこをランスに殺される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teoman is stunned, then is killed by Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが世界の秘密を語る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukuu reveals the secret of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界は創造神ルドラサウムの箱庭
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This world is a miniature garden created by the god of creation Rudrosaum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは神を倒すと決意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance resolves to defeat the god.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幾多の冒険を行う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He embarks on numerous adventures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全知全能の賢者ホラガ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The omniscient and omnipotent sage Horaga.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界は魔人ケイブリスの手に落ちる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The world falls into the hands of the demon Cavebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新魔王ビュートンの誕生
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The birth of the new Demon King Byuton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４ヶ月後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Four months later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は神々の国に降り立った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his group have descended to the land of the gods.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウィリスが現れて止めるが無理
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Willis appears and tries to stop them but fails.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女神アリスと戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They fight the goddess Alice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女神アリスに全滅させられた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were annihilated by the goddess Alice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界を変えるのはまだ早かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was still too early to change the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がリーザスに向けて出発
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his group set out toward Leazas.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しは警戒していたが、今は美樹の覚醒が気になってそろどころではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was a little cautious, but now I'm too concerned about Miki's awakening to pay attention to anything else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 路上の石ころのように眼中にない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is like a pebble on the road—completely out of sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 基本勝てずにゲームオーバーです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically, if you lose, it's game over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡的にケイブリスに勝てた場合
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you miraculously manage to defeat Cavebris,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やった・・やったぞ、カオスも大喜び
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I did it... I did it! Chaos is overjoyed too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさかケイブリスを倒すなんて、すげー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't believe I defeated Cavebris, awesome!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 喜んでいた所に報告が来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as I was celebrating, a report arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹ちゃんが・・美樹ちゃんが・・魔王になってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki-chan... Miki-chan has become the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、魔王美樹によりランスは殺され・・世界は暗黒に落ちる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, Lance was killed by Demon King Miki... and the world fell into darkness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｇａｍｅｏｖｅｒ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Game Over

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに進軍して来ている魔軍と何度か戦った後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After several battles with the demon army advancing on JAPAN,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフに接触する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They came into contact with Stroganov.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、戦うのはストロガノフではなく、彼は力が出せない状態というのを見せて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, it wasn't Stroganov who fought; he showed that he was unable to use his power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Maelita squad fought instead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに進軍して来ている魔軍と何度か戦った後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After several battles with the demon army advancing on JAPAN,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロに接触する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They came into contact with Pizarro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロはケイブリスに怒られびびっている、魔剣カオスを持つ者を殺して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pizarro, scared after angering Cavebris, attacks to kill anyone wielding the demon sword Chaos,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを献上すればケイブリスの心象もよくなるぞ、と攻撃してくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thinking that offering it will improve Cavebris's favor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフ、マエリータ隊、ピサロ、または魔物大将軍などを倒した後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After defeating Stroganov, Maelita squad, Pizarro, or the great demon generals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうだ、さすが俺様・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How's that? As expected of me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ＪＡＰＡＮに押し寄せてくる魔軍の数はあまりにも多い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the number of demon troops flooding into JAPAN is overwhelming.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類軍は総崩れ・・ランスがいくらがんばってもなんとか出来る状況では無かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The human army was completely broken—the situation was beyond what Lance could handle no matter how hard he tried.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ・・次・・とさらに戦うとするランスだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kuh... Lance tries to fight again, saying 'Next...',

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが止める、ランス様、傷、疲労・・もうあぶないです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiru stops him: "Lance-sama, with your wounds and fatigue... it's dangerous."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったん戻りましょう、このままではと必至で止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Desperately, she insists they retreat for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないとそれを受け入れるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance accepts it, saying it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 織田の城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oda's Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況は押されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle situation is unfavorable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: タイムカプセル、巨大戦艦を思いつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They come up with the idea of a time capsule and a giant battleship.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大戦艦遺跡に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have arrived at the giant battleship ruins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹と健太郎をスリープさせる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki and Kentaro are put into sleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからどうする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What shall we do from here?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王、勇者はいつ動き出すか分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King and the Hero could move at any time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後の事もなんとかする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will manage things for later as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、勇者テオマン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the hero Teoman

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の死者が５０％を越え準備が整った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More than 50% of humanity have died, preparations are complete.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦に侵入
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He infiltrates Lance's fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎と美樹を殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He kills Kentaro and Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランスが戻って来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Lance returns.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒コーラが勇者の真実を告げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The apostle Kola reveals the truth about the hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者のお仕事ごくろうさん、魔王はもうすぐ蘇る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good job on your hero duties; the Demon King will soon be revived."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言いたい放題いって立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She says whatever she wants and then leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テオマンは呆然、そこをランスに殺される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teoman is stunned, then is killed by Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが世界の秘密を語る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukuu reveals the secret of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界は創造神ルドラサウムの箱庭
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This world is a miniature garden created by the god of creation Rudrosaum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは神を倒すと決意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance resolves to defeat the god.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幾多の冒険を行う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He embarks on numerous adventures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全知全能の賢者ホラガ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The omniscient and omnipotent sage Horaga.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界は魔人ケイブリスの手に落ちる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The world falls into the hands of the demon Cavebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新魔王ビュートンの誕生
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The birth of the new Demon King Byuton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４ヶ月後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Four months later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は神々の国に降り立った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his group have descended to the land of the gods.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウィリスが現れて止めるが無理
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Willis appears and tries to stop them but fails.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女神アリスと戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They fight the goddess Alice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女神アリスに全滅させられた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were annihilated by the goddess Alice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界を変えるのはまだ早かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was still too early to change the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がリーザスに向けて出発
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his group set out toward Leazas.
